title: Game freezes when I press ANY keys
body: This game is really sucking for me, and it worked for the first day, which I played a reasonable handful of matches without problems, but just the other day, it froze on me... sat there for five minutes staring at a frozen screen. When I logged in today I got the "leave buster" message... tried playing the game and it still froze. Spent the entire game trying to figure it out and fix it. When the match ended, I got the message again. I'm also pretty sure it wasn't on my end either because every other part of my system worked... game music played, mouse moved, and I was able to log out/in on my computer to reset it, etc. What gives?

replies.body:
This might be caused by the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) game bar which has been known to freeze games like this.  Disabling it should do the trick.

There might be driver failure issues as well if you can still hear sounds.  The steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide can help with this, but I recommend sticking to custom games now to prevent anymore leaves.
